name: HTML, CSS, and Javascript for Web Developers
about: Do you realize that the only functionality of a web application that the user directly interacts with is through the web page? Implement it poorly and, to the user, the server-side becomes irrelevant! Today’s user expects a lot out of the web page: it has to load fast, expose the desired service, and be comfortable to view on all devices: from a desktop computers to tablets and mobile phones.

reviews.name: Rav Ahuja
reviews.review: I am so happy for you and thankful for helping me and many others like me gain online skills today

reviews.name: Alex Parker
reviews.review: This was a really great course, i learned so much, and it was really interesting and very well explained. I will be taking any more courses done by HR Sir! Really excellent course, thank you so much.

name: IBM Full Stack Software Developer Pro
about: Kickstart your career in application development. Master Cloud Native and Full Stack Development using hands-on projects involving HTML, JavaScript, Node.js, Python, Django, Containers, Microservices and more. No prior experience required.

reviews.name: Ramesh Sannareddy
reviews.review: This was a really great course, i learned so much, and it was really interesting and very well explained.And the field trip was good .Thank you HR Sir for this wonderful course !

name: Introduction to Web Development with HTML, CSS, JavaScript
about: Want to take the first steps to become a Cloud Application Developer? This course will lead you through the languages and tools you will need to develop your own Cloud Apps. Beginning with an explanation of how internet servers and clients work together to deliver applications to users, this course then takes you through the context for application development in the Cloud, introducing front-end, back-end, and full-stack development.

reviews.name: Upkar Lidder
reviews.review: Very interesting and well presented.  It's difficult to address all the different experience levels so some points were (to me) a bit laboured, but overall a useful, informative and enjoyable course.

name: Build a Full Website using WordPress
about: By the end of this project, you will create a full web-site that is attractive and user friendly using a free content management system, WordPress. You will learn how to create a website utilizing themes and plug-ins using the web creation tool. You’ll have a virtual space to showcase your business with customers who want to stay connected.

reviews.name: Joseph Santarcangelo
reviews.review: Many thanks to the creators of this course! It was a very solid refresher for me, even though I have spent in web development a few years by now. I thoroughly enjoyed every lesson. Thank you!

name: Build Your Portfolio Website with HTML and CSS
about: This 1-hour long tutorial will take you step by step to create a portfolio website. You will learn the basic components of a website, and how to create simple contents using HTML (hypertext markup language) and CSS (cascading style sheets), and how to host it on a popular developer website called “GitHub” with your own subdomain name!

reviews.name: Yan Luo
reviews.review: Excellent course for people with intermediate knowledge of programming. Very eloquently teaches Bootstrap framework and Javascript along with AJAX. Must take course for any aspiring web developer!

reviews.name: Ramesh Sannareddy
reviews.review: This was a really great course, i learned so much, and it was really interesting and very well explained.And the field trip was good .Thank you HR Sir for this wonderful course !

name: Front-End Web Development with React
about: This course explores Javascript based front-end application development, and in particular the React library (Currently Ver. 16.3). This course will use JavaScript ES6 for developing React application. You will also get an introduction to the use of Reactstrap for Bootstrap 4-based responsive UI design. You will be introduced to various aspects of React components. You will learn about React router and its use in developing single-page applications.

reviews.name: Yaakov Chaikin
reviews.review: I have learned many things such as HTML , CSS ,Javascript , Basic HTTP, JSON and ajax. I also learned that how to make best website through these languages. It's great journey. I fully enjoyed it.

reviews.name: Ramesh Sannareddy
reviews.review: This was a really great course, i learned so much, and it was really interesting and very well explained.And the field trip was good .Thank you HR Sir for this wonderful course !
